subject: Relationships
title: Why Smart People Stay in Bad Relationships
description: Learn Why Smart People Stay in Bad Relationships in one minute.

hook.text: She has a PhD. She runs a company. She can't leave a man who calls her stupid. Intelligence doesn't protect you.

buildup.text: Cognitive dissonance explains it: 'I'm smart, so I can't be in an abusive relationship. Therefore, this isn't abuse.'

discovery.text: Educated victims often rationalize more effectively. They find better explanations for staying â€” not better exits.

twist.text: Abusers target competent people. Controlling someone capable gives them more power than controlling someone fragile.

climax.text: Abuse isn't a failure of intelligence. It's a failure of the situation. Smart people need the same support as anyone.

punchline.text: Abuse isn't a failure of intelligence. It targets strength, not weakness.

quiz.question: Why do intelligent people stay in abusive relationships?
options: Cognitive dissonance helps them rationalize the situation
